name: Auto Twitter Hashtags
author: Kayleigh Thorpe

sections.description: Auto Twitter Hashtags is a WordPress plugin that reads the content of your posts and pages for hash-tagged words and links them to the relevant search entry in Twitter.
sections.installation:
1. Upload The plugin’s zip file to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload The plugin’s zip file to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
